source.d9daef6d:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib as plt
data = pd.read_csv("../input/StudentsPerformance.csv")
data = data.rename(columns={'math score': 'mathscore', 'reading score': 'readingscore'})
data.mathscore.plot( color = 'b',linewidth=1,label = "math",alpha = 0.5,grid = True)
data.readingscore.plot(color = 'y',linewidth=1,label = "reading", alpha = 0.5,grid = True)
#plt.title("READİNG AND MATH RESULTS") #WYH THİS COD İS NOT WORKİNG  CAN HELP ME ? 
plt.legend(loc='upper right')     # legend = puts label into plot
plt.xlabel('x axis')              # label = name of label
plt.ylabel('y axis')
plt.title('READİNG AND MATH RESULTS')            # title = title of plot
plt.show()
plt.show()
